preqs: Students must have passed BTG1200 or BTW1200 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {BTG1200, BTP1010, BTW1200} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {BTF2991, BTG3241, BTW2241}
Unit was previously coded {3351, BTG3241, BTW3241%, GBU3206, TBG3241}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 13, 20, 41, 50}

description: Legal implications of staff management decisions, individual employer-employee relationship, contract of employment, termination law including unfair dismissals, health and safety law in the workplace, vicarious liability agreements, awards and industrial action, constitutional considerations and discrimination law.
